channel.title: [317] How do we Change the XP we get when we hit an NPC? [317]
channel.description:
Title says it all
I have quit coding for a 1 year and im getting back into it and i forgot quite a few stuff.
-RedBloodelf2

item.title: [317] How do we Change the XP we get when we hit an NPC? [317]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Try to search for ‘addSkillXP’ or ‘hitdiff’ as stated above, but also notice what method/packet it’s under for future reference.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How do we Change the XP we get when we hit an NPC? [317]

item.title: [317] How do we Change the XP we get when we hit an NPC? [317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Search in client.java for *hitdiff
Theres like four different sections for Pvp PvNPC and some other stuff, change the number before the * to make it your exp rate.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How do we Change the XP we get when we hit an NPC? [317]

item.title: [317] How do we Change the XP we get when we hit an NPC? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Look for something along these lines in Client.java.

addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);

Read full topic
